#KardingPH at Isla Polillo in Quezon Province. May God protect our Kababayans there. Be safe. https://t.co/A3utr8Q857

IT'S GETTING CLEAR. Typhoon #KardingPH (#Noru) is a monstrous storm that could bring life-threatening weather situations across CENTRAL LUZON, METRO MANILA, CALABARZON, AND SOUTHERN PORTION OF NORTHERN LUZON later today. 

‚ö†Ô∏èALL ARE STRONGLY ADVISED TO MONITOR AND PREPARE! https://t.co/Y9kPNcS0uT

After the typhoon, I hope that we make it as an activity to preserve Sierra Madre. It has served as a barrier for us here in Luzon during calamities. Now, its body will have to shield us again from the super typhoon.

#KardingPH https://t.co/2dLC6yevOK
We are having a meeting right now, together with our chapter administrators from areas projected to be affected, as #KardingPH has intensified into a Super Typhoon category. https://t.co/e7BSDcLkjc
